title: Adding projects or workshops - quick tips

fields.message:
1. Add your content details in the main text editor field below. 👇
  2. Use the Excerpt field at the bottom of the page to add a brief description that will show on the main page for this content type. This should be no more than 2-3 lines long.
  3. Add an image to show in the main page grid layout using the Featured Image field in the right-hand column 👉. This image will also show on the individual page for projects.
  4. Use the Files field to upload any relevant documents to your content.
